title: Ancient Relic

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
On D2, receive a rolecard from a random sentry relevant to your slot. That will be your role, but will be town aligned. Also there's no such thing as "authorization".
As you are booting up, you will be blackmailed on day 1, and roleblocked on night one

desc:
Post 3435
*Its metallic parts have long rusted. It seemed to have an ulterior purpose, eliminating those who threaten.*
